title: Item sets cant be used in games
body: As of the previous patch i cannot use any of my item sets in game, they simply wont show up. I have already tried completely remaking the item sets and that does absolutely nothing. Is there anything i can do to be able to use my sets again?

replies.body:
When in game have you looked where it says 'Recommended Items' there's a small arrow pointing down, click that and it should come down with the Item sets. Alternatively, have you assigned them to a certain champion? You may have attached accidentally an {{champion:103}}  Item set to {{champion:84}} by mistake. Hope this helps. 
~Catspeare{{champion:268}}
